title: Keyboards
description: Keyboards are the centerpiece of any desk setup — the primary bridge between thought and execution. Whether you're coding, writing, or gaming, a good keyboard shapes comfort, speed, and precision, making it the most essential tool for productivity and creativity alike.

category.title: 65% Barebones Mechanical Keyboard - Black
category.description: This stripped-down, monochrome special doesn't come with keycaps or switches, so you can outfit it with anything of your choosing. It also don't include the decorative top case, so you'll get to select your favorite—or list of favorites—at check out. Installation is ultra-intuitive: each top decorative top case fits magnetically—and seamlessly—onto the keyboards specially designed polycarbonate case.

category.title: Stack Overflow Developer Keyboard
category.description: Tired of pretending you type your own code? Introducing the DevBoard™, the world's first keyboard designed exclusively for real developers — featuring only Ctrl, C, and V. Engineered with premium mechanical switches for maximum productivity and minimal originality, the DevBoard™ is perfect for anyone whose workflow consists of copy → paste → profit. Whether you're “borrowing” code from Stack Overflow or “collaborating” with ChatGPT, the DevBoard™ gives you everything you need — and nothing you don't.

title: Keycaps
description: Keycaps are where performance meets personality. The right set can transform the feel and sound of every keystroke while showcasing your unique aesthetic — making them one of the most expressive upgrades for any keyboard enthusiast.

category.title: Lunar New Year Keycap Set
category.description: Premium cut and sew crewneck sweater with own developed pattern featuring a boxy fit, dropped shoulders and added chest measurements for oversized drape under the arms. Densely knitted brushed French terry with uniform and slanted loopbacks lightly brushed for a buttery hand feel. Highest quality Organic cotton. Manufactured in Spain

title: Desk Mats
description: Deskmats tie a workspace together, blending function and style. They protect your desk, provide a smooth surface for both mouse and keyboard, and add a personal touch that makes your setup feel complete.

category.title: Lunar New Year Desk Mat
category.description: Each New Year brings well wishes, resolutions, and hopes for the future. On this desk mat, we're giving them all some character—or should we say: characters. Celebrating 2025 in true Chinese Zodiac-style, the Lunar New Year Desk Mat carries messages meant to be displayed

category.title: Eye of Sauron Desk Mat
category.description: Elevate your setup with our soft-touch desk mat, designed for comfort, precision, and style. It provides a smooth surface for effortless mouse gliding, protects your desk from scratches, and ties your whole workspace together — because every great setup deserves a solid foundation.
